title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 167.5 - Conduct of institution
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 167.5 - Conduct of institution

State Regulations
(a) Institutions shall provide the same instruction, materials and resources to all
students or groups of students in like circumstances. (b) Program operation, documentation, reporting, teacher qualifications and staff development activities shall be
appropriate to the services being provided and subject to the approval of the
commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
167.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
